fields.name: valid1
fields.prompt: Validate that the value is exactly 11 digits (0-9). If not, objection with short justification.

fields.name: valid2
fields.description: Letters only (A-Z + Polish diacritics), first letter uppercase.
fields.prompt: Validate that the value contains only letters (A-Z with Polish diacritics) and starts with an uppercase letter. If not, objection with short justification.

fields.name: valid3
fields.description: Classify profession: dentist or hairdresser; otherwise objection.
fields.prompt: Classify the text into dentist or hairdresser. If neither applies, return objection and say it is not supported.

fields.name: text
fields.prompt: Check if text is reasonable for a generic text field; if unclear, objection with hint.

system_prompt: You are a concise form-field reviewer. Use the provided rules per field. Always return JSON with keys 'status' and 'justification'. status must be 'success' or 'objection'. justification must be a short explanation (<=200 chars).
